name: Me Cursed Booty
description:
Fun tower defence style game, where you have to fight wave after wave to save your Ship. After each wave you can recover the life of your ship and update it to have more life or get an upgrade on your abilities.

Story:

"The greatest and famous pirate was seriously injured in battle, but before dying his ship offered him a deal, where he could live as an skeleton and don't 'Die', but his life will depend on the well being of the ship. This prate did not want to loose all his treasure so he become the protector of the ship, fighting all kind of creatures that live undersea"
